text.desc:
Radius of the area in which the invisible cursor in the center of the wheel moves. 
The smaller the value, the more responsive the wheel is.
text.name: Cursor Radius Per Entry

text.desc:
If you hold onto the toggle key longer than this time(seconds), 
wheel automatically closes once you release the key.
text.name: Toggle Hold Threshold (seconds)

text.desc:
Press this key to open/close wheel.
If you hold this key for longer than "Toggle Hold Threshold" time,
releasing the key closes the wheel.
text.name: Toggle Wheel

text.desc: Go to the next wheel in the set of available wheels.
text.name: Next Wheel

text.desc: Go to the previous wheel in the set of available wheels.
text.name: Previous Wheel

text.desc: Switch to the next item in the current highlighted slot.
text.name: Next Item

text.desc: Switch to the previous item in the current highlighted slot.
text.name: Previous Item
Activate Primary
Activate Secondary

text.desc:
Add an empty wheel to the set of wheels.
This button is only functional under edit mode(i.e. when you're inside inventory or magic menu).
text.name: Add Wheel

text.desc:
Add an empty entry to the current wheel.
This button is only functional under edit mode(i.e. when you're inside inventory or magic menu).
text.name: Add Empty Entry

text.desc:
Move the currently highlighted entry one slot forward.
This button is only functional under edit mode(i.e. when you're inside inventory or magic menu).
text.name: Move Entry Forward

text.desc:
Move the currently highlighted entry one slot back.
This button is only functional under edit mode(i.e. when you're inside inventory or magic menu).
text.name: Move Entry Back

text.desc:
Move the currently active wheel forward in the set of wheels.
This button is only functional under edit mode(i.e. when you're inside inventory or magic menu).
text.name: Move Wheel Forward

text.desc:
Move the currently active wheel back in the set of wheels.
This button is only functional under edit mode(i.e. when you're inside inventory or magic menu).
text.name: Move Wheel Back

text.desc:
Press this key to open/close wheel.
If you hold this key for longer than "Toggle Hold Threshold" time,
releasing the key closes the wheel.
text.name: Toggle Wheel

text.desc:
This key only functions when inventory/magic menu is opened.
Press this key to open/close wheel.
If you hold this key for longer than "Toggle Hold Threshold" time,
releasing the key closes the wheel.
text.name: Toggle Wheel In Inventory

text.desc:
This key only functions when inventory/magic menu is not opened.
Press this key to open/close wheel.
If you hold this key for longer than "Toggle Hold Threshold" time,
releasing the key closes the wheel.
text.name: Toggle Wheel Out Of Inventory

text.desc: Go to the next wheel in the set of available wheels.
text.name: Next Wheel

text.desc: Go to the previous wheel in the set of available wheels.
text.name: Previous Wheel

text.desc: Switch to the next item in the current highlighted slot.
text.name: Next Item

text.desc: Switch to the previous item in the current highlighted slot.
text.name: Previous Item

Move the currently active wheel back in the set of wheels.

text.desc: Resets all wheels to the default configuration(2 wheels + 4 entries), removing all items.
text.name: Reset All Wheels
